mapper.select: SELECT f.fb_res_num, f.fb_res_reg_date, r.res_num, r.res_name, SUBSTRING(c.fb_code_num,9) AS fb_code_num, c.fb_reason, f.m_id, f.fb_res_check FROM tb_fb_res AS f INNER JOIN tb_res AS r ON f.res_num = r.res_num INNER JOIN tb_fb_code AS c ON f.fb_code_num = c.fb_code_num ORDER BY f.fb_res_reg_date DESC;

SELECT f.fb_sights_num, f.fb_sights_reg_date, s.sights_num, s.sights_name, SUBSTRING(f.fb_code_num,9) AS fb_code_num, c.fb_reason, f.fb_sights_contents, f.m_id, f.fb_sights_check FROM tb_fb_sights AS f INNER JOIN tb_sights AS s ON f.sights_num = s.sights_num INNER JOIN tb_fb_code AS c ON f.fb_code_num = c.fb_code_num ORDER BY fb_sights_reg_date DESC;
